citation: Proclamation under the Police Powers (Controlled Operations) Act 2006 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Police Powers (Controlled Operations) Act 2006

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Police Powers (Controlled Operations) Act 2006 fix 1 September 2009 as the day on which that Act commences.

10 August 2009

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LARA GIDDINGS

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 August 2009

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
